title: Main Semantic Element
description: Primary content of the document or component. The dominant content area.

$inheritance.reason: Main IS-A element with all base properties

semanticMeaning.description: The dominant content of the document/component - unique content that is not repeated
semanticMeaning.whenToUse: Central content that is the focus, not navigation or sidebars

content.description: Main content text - ALWAYS canvas editable

textProperties.rule: Main always renders, content is editable even when empty (placeholder shown)

structure.notes: Main can contain text content AND child elements

containerBehavior.description: Main is a DROP ZONE for child components

requirements: Only one main element per document (at page level)
Can have multiple main elements in components (card main, article main)
